abstract: Baltimore judge postpones January trial of police officer Caesar Goodson by five days; Goodson's trial is second amid six officers facing criminal charges related to April death of Freddie Gray.
lead_paragraph: The Maryland Judiciary issued a statement Monday saying the trial of the officer, Caesar Goodson, will begin Jan. 11 instead of Jan. 6.

headline.main: Maryland: Trial Is Postponed for 2nd Officer in Freddie Gray Case
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Trial Is Postponed for 2nd Officer in Freddie Gray Case

snippet: The Maryland Judiciary issued a statement Monday saying the trial of the officer, Caesar Goodson, will begin Jan. 11 instead of Jan. 6.
